fast3d.math.geom.Plate

  • Packages that use Plate 
    Package Description

    fast3d.util.math

    • Uses of Plate in fast3d.util.math

      Methods in fast3d.util.math with parameters of type Plate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Relationship RelationshipAnalytics.analyze(Plate a, Plate b)
      a wrapper to analyze(a,b,0.0); with zeroLockControl disabled
      static Relationship RelationshipAnalytics.analyze(Plate a, Plate b, double zeroLockControl)
      compares the plates
      if ... the result will be ...: the plates are equal : IDENTICAL the plates are real-parallel : PARALLEL the first plate intersects the second plate (or vice versa) : INTERSECTING
      static Relationship RelationshipAnalytics.analyze(Plate a, Point b)
      a wrapper to analyze(a,b,0.0); with zeroLockControl disabled
      static Relationship RelationshipAnalytics.analyze(Plate plate, Point point, double zeroLockControl)
      compares the position of the point to the plate
      if the point is on the plate result will be intersecting otherwise parallel
      static Relationship RelationshipAnalytics.analyze(Plate a, Straight b)
      a wrapper to analyze(a,b,0.0); with zeroLockControl disabled
      static Relationship RelationshipAnalytics.analyze(Plate plate, Straight straight, double zeroLockControl)
      compares the straight and plate
      if ... the result will be ...: the plate contains the straight : INCIDENT the straight is real-parallel to the plate : PARALLEL the straight intersects the plate : INTERSECTING
      static double RelationshipAnalytics.computeDistance(Plate a, Plate b)
      for a plate PARALLEL to the other plate the distance between the plates is greater than 0 otherwise 0
      the distance between two plates is the distance between the nadir point of any point on the first plate to the other plate
      static double RelationshipAnalytics.computeDistance(Plate a, Point b)
      for a point non-INCIDENT to the plate the distance between the point and the plate is greater than 0 otherwise 0
      the distance between a point and a plate is the distance between the point and its nadir point on the plate
      static double RelationshipAnalytics.computeDistance(Plate a, Straight b)
      for a straight PARALLEL to the plate the distance between the straight and the plate is greater than 0 otherwise 0
      the distance between a straight and a plate is the distance between the nadir point of any point on the straight to the plate
      static Straight RelationshipAnalytics.computeIntersection(Plate a, Plate b)
      a wrapper to computeIntersection(Plate,Plate,double) with zeroLockControl disabled
      static Straight RelationshipAnalytics.computeIntersection(Plate a, Plate b, double zeroLockControl)
      for INTERSECTING plates this method computes the straight that is INCIDENT for both plates
      static Point RelationshipAnalytics.computeIntersection(Plate plate, Straight straight)
      for a straight INTERSECTING the plate this method computes the point that is on both the straight and the plate
